title: How to install java on EC2 Ubuntu 16-04
content:
This blog is in continuation to blog How to create EC2 instance on AWS Free Tier plan. if you missed please revisit.

First we need to get an Ubuntu (16.04) instance. for this we can use AWS Console. once ubuntu machine is up and running follow the following approach

subContents.SubTitle: Step by Step Process
subContents.SubContent:
1. Update the package :

$ sudo apt-get update

2. install Java Runtime Environment (JRE) :

$ sudo apt-get install default-jre

 3. install the JDK :

$ sudo apt-get install default-jdk

  Once you excute following commands. Java will be successfully installed in your ubuntu machine. you can verify the java version by following commands :

$ java -version

recommendations.content: Design Patterns: Elements of Reusable Object-Oriented Software is a software engineering book describing software design patterns. recommendations.content: Given that you are a professional robber who is planning to rob houses along a street.
